long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This powerful tool adds a convenient player directly to Discogs collection pages, allowing you to:

• Listen to albums and EPs instantly from any Discogs collection
• Play music without leaving the collection page or opening multiple tabs
• Discover new music effortlessly as you browse through collections
• Enjoy a streamlined, user-friendly interface integrated into the Discogs experience

What's New in Version 1.1.8:
- Added support for the new Discogs design

What's New in Version 1.1.7:
- Fixed a bug where playing your own collection was not working.

What's New in Version 1.1.5:
- Fixed few minor bugs related to certain Chrome versions.

What's New in Version 1.1.4:
- Fixed a bug where releases with multiple artists were getting errors. 

What's New in Version 1.1.3:
- Improving stability and fixed various bugs. 

What's New in Version 1.1.2:
- Improve Discogs Collection Player stability, functionality, and responsiveness.

What's New in Version 1.1.1:
- Fixed a bug where you got stuck on the first track playing. 

What's New in Version 1.1.0:

- Added a new "Play All" feature: Now you can play all tracks from the current page of your collection in one go!
- The "Play All" button is conveniently located in the table header of your collection.
- Improved performance: Videos are now loaded in batches to ensure smooth playback.
- Added a "Load More" button in the playlist to easily add more tracks.
- Enhanced user interface for better visibility and usability.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.
